Class Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::InputConfig

The desired input location and metadata.

Methods

#gcs_source

#gcs_source => ::Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::GcsSource
Returns
Type Description
::Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::GcsSource

The Google Cloud Storage location to read the input from.

#gcs_source=

#gcs_source=(value) => ::Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::GcsSource
Returns
Type Description
::Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::GcsSource

The Google Cloud Storage location to read the input from.

#content

#content => ::String
Returns
Type Description
::String

File content, represented as a stream of bytes. Note: As with all bytes fields, protobuffers use a pure binary representation, whereas JSON representations use base64.

Currently, this field only works for BatchAnnotateFiles requests. It does not work for AsyncBatchAnnotateFiles requests.

#content=

#content=(value) => ::String
Returns
Type Description
::String

File content, represented as a stream of bytes. Note: As with all bytes fields, protobuffers use a pure binary representation, whereas JSON representations use base64.

Currently, this field only works for BatchAnnotateFiles requests. It does not work for AsyncBatchAnnotateFiles requests.

#mime_type

#mime_type => ::String
Returns
Type Description
::String

The type of the file. Currently only "application/pdf", "image/tiff" and "image/gif" are supported. Wildcards are not supported.

#mime_type=

#mime_type=(value) => ::String
Returns
Type Description
::String

The type of the file. Currently only "application/pdf", "image/tiff" and "image/gif" are supported. Wildcards are not supported.
